nodes.text: An annex was a secret storage site of the Offworld Mining Corporation hidden inside the wall of the Enrichment Dome located on the planet Bandomeer. The dome was used by the Agricultural Corps, a branch of the Jedi Service Corps, to grow plants for their agricultural research. The annex was used by Offworld to store mining supplies such as explosives, thermal detonators, and grenades. By keeping this annex located in an AgriCorps facility, Offworld was violating AgriCorps rules.

In 44 BBY, Obi-Wan Kenobi, a failed Jedi Initiate who had been assigned to work with the AgriCorps on Bandomeer found the annex while exploring the dome. Shortly after the discovery, Kenobi reported its existence to Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn.
The annex was featured in the young adult novel Jedi Apprentice: The Dark Rival, written by Jude Watson. The Dark Rival was the second book in the Jedi Apprentice series.
